author: Armando Tinoco
title: WBD Boss David Zaslav Celebrates DC Win At The Box Office: “Superman Is Just The First Step”

author: Michael McCann
title: WBD, Zaslav Say Media Coverage of NBA Deal Undercuts Investor Suit
description: Warner Bros. Discovery CEO David Zaslav and CFO Gunnar Wiedenfels argue in a recent court filing that a federal securities class action brought by purchasers of WBD stock is without merit. The plaintiffs say they were misled by WBD’s statements and omissions …
